about_the_game:
Grey Instinct - Part 2 continues off with Grey and Kana being attacked by a mysterious intruder! They chase after him and stumble into an even bigger mystery! What's going on? Where is Uncle David? And more importantly, will Grey get any better at dating?!?

MORE CONTENT

As Grey explores the rest of New Corium he will meet many new people and find himself in new situations has he works to solve the mystery! This includes:
  • 5 new ladies to woo and go on dates with, some more than once ;)
  • 3 new chapters, each packed with more content than the entirety of Part 1!
  • Many new beautiful and unique cyberpunk dystopian locations to explore!
  • A larger, more interactive world! Many new quests and side quests to go on for the interesting mask-wearing residents of New Corium.
  • Lots of puzzles with a fun and engaging difficulty curve all the way to the end!
  • A fun and lovable sidekick for Grey to banter with.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains nudity and drug references.

Nudity can be disabled from the in-game options menu.

name: Grey Instinct - Part 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
